last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 30
last_episode_to_air.overview: SEASON FINALE: Karma faces Shafeeq’s wrath after he discovers her betrayal. Yamen must choose between family and love.

name: Till Death
overview: Fed up with his wife’s distancing from him, Hadi goes on a business trip to Turkey where he meets a special woman, an encounter that changes his life forever.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Amid a marriage on the rocks, Reem's husband succumbs to adulterous temptation, but this lusty encounter will change the couple's lives forever.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: With their game now exposed, Reem and Sahar become prime targets in a revenge plot as secrets unravel and their friendship devolves into a fierce feud.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Reem and Sahar choose to start anew. But just when things start coming together, new vendettas emerge, digging up a past never buried.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Hadi tries to get to the bottom of what makes Reem careworn, and later, travels to Turkey where he runs into Sahar.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: When Basel visits Hadi's house, he senses Reem’s agony and encourages her to give her marriage a chance. Reem packs her bags and decides to follow her husband.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Hadi is surprised to find Reem at the hotel ready to pour her heart out to him. Later, Sahar and Reem meet up.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Reem tries to drive Sahar away from her life and chooses to start a family with Hadi. Amin continues with his reckless acts.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Basel meets Sahar and takes a liking to her. Reem pours her heart out to Hanan. Hadi stumbles upon a shocking discovery.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Hadi is beside himself with rage when he sees Sahar with Basel, and later, tries to come clean with the latter. Reem receives worrying news.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Mona grows suspicious of Reem and tries to find out what’s inside the box. Sahar carries out her scheme, targeting Basel and Hadi.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Omar turns the heat up on Reem. Sahar decides to break up with Basel, leaving him devastated.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Hadi reaches out to Sahar following Basel’s incident. Reem grows suspicious of her husband, and later reproaches Sahar.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: While details about Reem and Sahar’s past come to the surface, Omar finds himself in a bind.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Sahar spends time with her mum. Saria and Mona look for the key. Later, Basel and Sahar spring a surprise on everyone.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Hadi is upset by the news of Basel and Sahar’s marriage. Reem tries to find out about Omar’s plans. Mona comes clean with Najah about the key.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: When Saria recounts everything to Amin, the latter grows suspicious of Reem. Basel’s mother is upset upon receiving some news. Mahmoud finds himself in a bind.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Fawwaz tries to blackmail Hadi. Someone calls Reem by her real name while she’s out with her husband. Fifi finds herself in dire straits.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Amin tells Sahar about the box, and later, Najah manages to open it. Hadi receives a threatening call. It seems that Reem has figured out Sahar’s weakness.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Having had his men hold Fawwaz captive, Hadi presents the latter with an offer. Reem is up to something while Sahar confronts her about her pregnancy.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: A confrontation between Afif and Basel takes place. Reem tells Omar that she has left the past behind. Abu Mahmoud’s fate hangs in the balance.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: Following his recovery, Basel asks his brother to take him to Fawwaz. Reem talks to Kholoud about the orphanage life. Amir has something up his sleeve.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: Amin brings Lamis to work at the villa. Sahar and Reem’s relationship grows tense. Amir arrives in Lebanon where he schedules a meeting with Hadi and Basel.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: Amir meets up with Hadi at the company and presents him with an offer. Sahar’s helping Mahmoud out of prison gets her into a confrontation with Basel.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: When Omar decides to start a new life with Fifi away from Reem and Sahar, the latter takes harsh measures to force him back.

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: Sahar and Reem are taken aback when they see Amir upon their arrival at the restaurant. Later, Reem makes up an excuse to leave with Hadi.

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: Omar tries to escape from the villa. When Hadi is informed that Amir is leaving, he sends his men to kidnap him.

episodes.name: Episode 24
episodes.overview: Sahar endures one shock after the other as she finds out about Lamees’s marriage. Hadi reads the document he received, and later, reveals to Basel the truth.

episodes.name: Episode 25
episodes.overview: Lamees is rushed to the hospital. Sahar springs a surprise on Reem while Hadi and Basel move forward with their retaliation plan.

episodes.name: Episode 26
episodes.overview: Reem takes matters into her own hands to solve Lamees’s problem with Jaber. Hadi invites Omar over for dinner. Sariya and Hanan lock horns.

episodes.name: Episode 27
episodes.overview: Basema confesses to her crime. While spying on Reem’s phone, Hadi learns something that shakes him to his core. Sahar and Omar are up to something.

episodes.name: Episode 28
episodes.overview: Omar asks Najah to tell Hadi that she has left for Syria. Hadi discusses having babies with Reem and lays the adoption choice on the table.

episodes.name: Episode 29
episodes.overview: After Reem comes clean with Hadi about the whole truth, the latter takes a step to protect himself. Later, a kidnapping operation spirals out of control.

episodes.name: Episode 30
episodes.overview: Hadi confronts Reem with her lies. The girls find themselves in a bind when the police break into the place.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Amid a marriage on the rocks, Reem's husband succumbs to adulterous temptation, but this lusty encounter will change the couple's lives forever.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: With their game now exposed, Reem and Sahar become prime targets in a revenge plot as secrets unravel and their friendship devolves into a fierce feud.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Leen and Samar are the new Reem and Sahar, now living in Tunisia and working as bartenders. Their neighbour, Bob, gets them in trouble when he hands Leen a USB.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Fleeing danger, Reem and Sahar decide to leave Tunisia, but fate might separate them. Suspicions arise in Lebanon when Hanan receives an unexpected call.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: After a failed attempt to end his own life, a new danger threatens Jawad. Reem is reunited with Sahar, and they are forced to carry out Karma’s orders.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Hamza is bent on hunting Karma down. Despite their release, Reem and Sahar are destined to relive their disastrous past.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Karma assigns Reem and Sahar their first task. When Hanan leaves her mobile unattended, Sarya seizes the opportunity to answer a call that brings her money.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Mahmoud announces his political ambitions. Sahar pulls out of her mission. Reem tries to seduce Louay.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Reem and Sahar try to set a trap for Karma. Later, Makram hands them a dossier filled with information about Karma’s past.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Makram pays the price of helping Reem and Sahar. Rasheed’s jealousy embarrasses Lamees. Sahar plans her next move.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Reem’s colleagues conspire against her. Reem and Sahar learn what they need about Tala to carry out their plan. Sarya puts Abdallah’s life in danger.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Reem rebuffs Louay when he tries to get closer to her. When Sahar stands in the way of Reem’s plans, an unforeseen problem arises.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Kholood uncovers a mystery concerning Sarya. Adib accuses Hatem of harming his family. Jawad pays Sahar a surprise visit.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Tala discovers two painful truths at once. Adib vows to take justice into his own hands. Louay runs out of patience with Karma.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Louay opens up to Reem about his past. Shafeeq’s findings jeapordize Mahmoud’s political future. Sahar sets out to win Rola’s trust.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: After an old video of her is leaked, someone from Amal's past starts following her. Karma struggles to reach Louay. Sahar rebuffs Hatem and gets closer to his sister.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: In an attempt to tease Jawad, Sahar accepts Hatem’s invitation to dinner. A drunk Karma pays Reem and Sahar a surprise visit. Tala confronts Louay with his mistake.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Louay is infuriated upon discovering the secret that Karma has kept from him for seven years. Jawad overreacts when he learns of Hatem and Sahar’s relationship.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Trying to win back Jawad, Zeina offers Sahar a bribe to leave her job. Rola goes back to Adeeb only to…

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: Sahar urges Rola to take revenge on Adeeb for what he did. Jawad visits Sahar asking for forgiveness. Karma’s jealousy puts Reem in danger.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: Rola carries out Sahar's orders and spends the night with Adeeb. Reem and Sahar set a trap for Sarya. Adeeb tries to play Karma off against Louay.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: Reem and Sahar’s friendship is put to the test because of Louay. The duo regains Karma’s trust. Adeeb and Hatem pay the price for conspiring against Karma.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: Amal makes a hasty decision. Sarya asks for Sahar’s permission to return to Lebanon. After her mission is over, Sahar gains Karma’s recognition.

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: Nadeem tries to get closer to Lamees after she joins Kholood on set. Sahar and Reem have a difficult heart-to-heart talk before the big day.

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: Rasheed’s jealousy pushes Lamees to make a drastic decision. Mahmoud takes a bold step for Amal’s sake. Sahar reopens old wounds.

episodes.name: Episode 24
episodes.overview: Louay opens up to Reem about his past while Jawad struggles to redefine his relationship with Sahar. Hanan tries to reconcile Lamees and Rasheed.

episodes.name: Episode 25
episodes.overview: Tala opens up to Karma about her feelings towards Louay. Hanan receives an important call from Reem.

episodes.name: Episode 26
episodes.overview: When Reem notices Jawad’s jealousy over Sahar, she urges him to get close to her. Sarya has important information to share with Reem and Sahar.

episodes.name: Episode 27
episodes.overview: Lamees tries to escape the hangar. Amal hides the truth from Umm Mahmoud. Hanan suffers a health setback.

episodes.name: Episode 28
episodes.overview: After Tala’s kidnapping, Karma takes revenge on one of Shafeeq’s men. Sahar risks her own life when Shafeeq tries to humiliate her.

episodes.name: Episode 29
episodes.overview: After eavesdropping on Louay and Yamen’s conversation, Tala discovers the truth. Hanan urges Amal to rethink her decision.

episodes.name: Episode 30
episodes.overview: SEASON FINALE: Karma faces Shafeeq’s wrath after he discovers her betrayal. Yamen must choose between family and love.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Reem and Sahar choose to start anew. But just when things start coming together, new vendettas emerge, digging up a past never buried.
